publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-918 Mr Bruce McFee: Compulsory Registration of Private Landlords-That the Parliament believes that a system of compulsory registration of private landlords with local authorities should be incorporated into the Antisocial Behaviour etc. (Scotland) Bill.
S2M-918 Compulsory Registration of Private Landlords (lodged on 17 February 2004) Mr Adam Ingram*, Rob Gibson*
S2M-918 Compulsory Registration of Private Landlords (lodged on 17 February 2004) Ms Sandra White*
